vote.title: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of two subsurface easements containing a total of approximately 10,865 square feet of land to Oncor Electric Delivery Company, LLC for the construction, maintenance and use of power lines and electric transformer facilities in the downtown area beneath City-owned land located near the intersection of South Lamar Street and Interstate Highway-30 - Revenue: Convention Center Construction Fund ($277,801.25) and General Fund ($40,000.00)
vote.description: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of two subsurface easements containing a total of approximately 10,865 square feet of land to Oncor Electric Delivery Company, LLC for the construction, maintenance and use of power lines and electric transformer facilities in the downtown area beneath City-owned land located near the intersection of South Lamar Street and Interstate Highway-30 - Revenue: Convention Center Construction Fund ($277,801.25) and General Fund ($40,000.00)
